Actions.Name: Bolt
Actions.Effects: At round 3+, increase area to large blast and deals bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Mighty Summoning
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 is removed from the battlefield, then placed in any space adjacent to the [name]. Alternately, the [name] can remove any adjacent ally, then place them in any space in range 4.

Actions.Name: Riven
Actions.Description: Choose a foe in range 8. At the end of that character's turn, they take 3 piercing damage, once, for every 3 spaces of distance between them and the [name].
